Title: India’s GSPC issues tender to buy one first-half March LNG cargo
Description: India’s state-owned Gujarat State Petroleum (GSPC) has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on Mar. 1-15 to the Petronet-operated 17.5 mtpa Dahej LNG receiving terminal in India’s western state of Gujarat. The tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand’s PTT, Taiwan’s CPC seek April LNG cargoes as April spot supplies emerge
Description: Taiwan’s state-owned CPC and Thailand’s state-owned PTT are both seeking April cargoes through tenders closing today and on Feb. 17, respectively.
Author: CK

Title: Sakhalin Energy offers one LNG cargo loading in late March
Description: Sakhalin Energy has issued a tender to sell one cargo that will load on Mar. 22 at its 10.9 mtpa Sakhalin LNG facility at Russia’s Prigorodnoye port. The tender closes on Feb. 17.
Author: CK

Title: APLNG offers March LNG cargo; seeks ship for DES cargo sale option
Description: Australia Pacific LNG (APLNG) is offering one cargo on a free-on-board (FOB) or delivered ex-ship (DES) basis that will load on Mar. 29-30 at its 9 mtpa plant in Queensland  through a tender closing on Feb. 16.
Author: CK
